title: Special District 9 - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Police   Politics   Post-apocalyptic   Schemes And Conspiracies   Weak to Strong
author: 伪戒
description:
After the catastrophe tore earth apart, food was scarce, resources were lacking, and the world was in chaos…

A young man who fought his way out of the Development District arrived at the Ninth Special District on his own, hoping to make a living. With a few friends that he met along the way, he rose through the ranks amidst the chaotic era and forged his own legend.>
